uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.hadoop

Class IP

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.hadoop.AutoWritable
      • uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.hadoop.IP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class IP
extends AutoWritable
    A Writable for representing an IPv4 address. A valid instance will have a non-null value field with four integers separated by 3 periods with each int in the range [0,256).

    • Field Summary
